content: sweet coasters that are quick to whip up ideal for stash busting and will make a lovely and thoughtful gift these coasters are a perfect addition to bedside tables a work desk or a coffee table alongside a favourite reading nook advanced adventurous beginner to intermediate level recommended yarn dk / 8 ply / cat 3 weight yarn ~6-8g / 0 2-0 4oz per coaster any fibre / yarn that is easy to wash and does not readily pill such as cotton cotton blends easy wash wool and non-pill acrylic example project mix of panda carnival 8ply acrylic natural and pink and marvel 8ply acrylic green using ~6g / 0 2oz in total per coaster size is ~12cm / 4 7 in diameter from petal to petal the flower motifs also make super sweet bunting **please note this pattern is also available for free on my blog ** please tag me @thecrochetfix and hash tag your projects #floralelegancecoasters on social media many thanks to the following testers for testing this coaster design karla der @madebykarla on ig @madebykarlacrochet on fb madebykarla on ravelry richelle cricks @richellecricks on ig richelle362 on ravelry claudia merkel @pieintheskyboutique on ig shannon maughan @the crafty runner on ig thecraftyrunner on ravelry tania barry @shewgirl1 on ig shewgirl on ravelry beth brady @coffeeyarn life on ig
